mapper.insert:
select seq_accommodation.nextVal from dual
insert into project_accommodation (ano,homename,maxperson,birfcontent,content,price,bedcount,breakfast,parkingarea,wifi,region,region2,region3,region4,region5,ReplyCnt) values(#{ano},#{homename},#{maxperson},#{birfcontent},#{content},#{price},#{bedcount},#{breakfast},#{parkingarea},#{wifi},#{region},#{region2},#{region3},#{region4},#{region5},0)
